scripts.install: cd src/env-regex-raw && wasm-pack build && rm pkg/package.json && cd .. && rm -rf ./dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp -r env-regex-raw/pkg dist/pkg
scripts.build: cd src/env-regex-raw && wasm-pack build && rm pkg/package.json && cd .. && cd .. && rm -rf ./dist && mkdir -p dist/env-regex-raw/pkg && cp -r src/env-regex-raw/pkg dist/env-regex-raw && tsc -p tsconfig.json
